CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Start_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Start_Date__c ) + 20 + FLOOR((20-1)/5)*2, 1, (Start_Date__c ) + 20 + FLOOR((20)/5)*2, 2, (Start_Date__c ) + 20 + FLOOR((20+1)/5)*2, 3, (Start_Date__c ) + 20 + FLOOR((20+2)/5)*2, 4, (Start_Date__c ) + 20 + FLOOR((20+3)/5)*2, 5, (Start_Date__c ) + 20 + CEILING((20)/5)*2, 6, (Start_Date__c ) - IF(20>0,1,0) + 20 + CEILING((20)/5)*2, null)
CustomField.label: Service Manual Due Date
